summary: A rehabilitated drug addict kills a baseball player in self defense, threatening her chances of regaining custody of her children.
cast: Alexandra Paul|Linden Ashby|Michele Greene|Maxim Roy|Dean Hagopian|Jonathan Higgins|Tim Post|Sophie Gendron|Chelsea Ceci|Tanya Trombetta|Danette Mackay|Michael O'Reilly|James O'Regan|Vincent Leclerc|Steve Dylan|Anthony D'Ambrosio|Jim McNabb|Peter Michael Dillon|Jon Dore|Louis A. Massicotte|Diana Noris|Helen Batabyal|Karl Claude|Sally Clelford|Jason Harper|Brett Kelly|Dani Kind|Sheila Veenstra
title: Una mujer acorralada
